title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label's height does not change immediately.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label.
2. Edit the font size of the label to "18 points".
OB: The label's height remains the same after modifying its font size.
EB: The label's height should adjust accordingly after modifying its font size.
SR:
1. Add a label.
2. Modify the font size of the label to "18 points".
3. Observe the label's height and ensure it adjusts accordingly.
